cn.trackCensoredName: 腾讯视频-折腰 全网独播
cn.trackName: 腾讯视频-折腰 全网独播
cn.releaseNotes: 《折腰》新剧开播，看宋祖儿刘宇宁世仇联姻极致带感！NBA东西部决赛对阵出炉，雷霆vs森林狼、步行者vs尼克斯，巅峰对决全程直播！
cn.description:
电视剧热播：
《陷入我们的热恋》现偶之光顶级上头！刘浩存王安宇要谈不谈得暧昧最撩人
《刑侦12》港式新版七宗罪超敢拍，林保怡陈法蓉陷连环凶案！
《亲爱的仇敌》细腻戳心！成年人的猜忌权衡野心，高叶陈妍希演绎新型女性关系
《刑警的日子》现实流刑侦大剧！欧豪张佳宁何冰连破15桩高能奇案
《榜上佳婿》CP乱炖嗑上头！王子奇卢昱晓放榜捉婿结良缘，青梅竹马苏到腿软
《狮城山海》热血江湖！巍子杨旭文浴血激战南洋华人圈，搏出帮派传奇
综艺强档：
《哈哈哈哈哈 第5季》要碎了！五哈爆笑英文版猜歌，邓超艺术细胞泛滥当场编歌！李乃文一路开挂为自己正名，陈赫被逼到暴走？
《开始推理吧 第3季》高颜值推理团全员海盗风！刘宇宁超级加辈大哥变“大爸”，跟白宇热巴金靖组成相亲相爱一家人。
《一见你就笑》刘浩存王安宇《陷入我们的热恋》超甜局～两人贴脸对视拉丝互动，刘浩存为王安宇报“犁地”之仇～小情侣太甜了。
《毛雪汪》徐艺洋徐志胜爆笑来袭～徐艺洋自曝和黄子韬的婚礼细节，还要和徐志胜组成三口之家？毛毛雪琴在线震惊中！
《演员请就位 第3季》演员跑组《狂飙》和《山花烂漫时》，杨子变酗酒父亲和猪一起睡觉太拼了，张嘉元冷脸演老默杀鱼适配度满分。
《奔跑吧》原班人马每周五爆笑开跑，孟子义李昀锐合体马拉松接力。
《天赐的声音 第6季》张靓颖刘宇宁双人热舞爆改《九万字》，张碧晨谭维维《王招君》唱到哽咽！
《恋恋不忘的我们》分手情侣的顶级爱情修罗场！前任重逢暗流涌动，是旧情复燃还是奔赴新欢？
《年轻的战场之太好“校”了》乐华艺人团建，开启游戏大乱斗！蒙眼猜美食pk，猛男俯卧撑对决？
电影超燃：
《唐探1900》王宝强、刘昊然笑闹探案！
《毒液：最后一舞》毒液埃迪共赴终极战斗
《猩球崛起：新世界》硬核科幻！史诗级人猿对决
《根本停不下来》包贝尔带全家飙车笑疯了
《怒水西流》全员狠人！宁理、陈都灵陷连环血案
《天堂旅行团》彭昱畅杨恩又救赎之旅
《斗破苍穹4：逃亡》萧炎斗气重燃激战云岚宗
《不破不立》“哪吒2”幕后，饺子领衔动画人创造奇迹！
《命中罪爱》尺度猛片！张静初、余皑磊罪案迷局
强势国漫：
《王者荣耀荣耀之章命运篇》铠皇回归，单挑王闪现动画一刀万爆！
《仙逆剧场版 神临之战》王林合体古神之躯再创修魔海
《遮天》姜神王复苏，叶凡破境四极！
《画江湖之不良人 第7季》百亿国漫，王者归来！
《斗罗大陆2》白发唐三在线邀约亡灵天灾
《斗破苍穹年番》爽看斗尊萧炎携四色异火登场
《火影忍者》全网独播！重温鸣人来时路，重燃火之意志
精品短剧：
《名不虚传》神医下山，超燃爽剧！草根小伙飞针扭转生死，无名小卒逆袭神医！
《你是我的正午暖阳》豪门千金遭继妹背刺，携手拳王保镖打响复仇之战！
《我叫赵甲第之锋芒》天才富二代赵甲第归来！一路开挂横扫商海！
纪录片新热：
《激流2》商业观察纪录片正在热播，聚焦在时代激流中，正在经受巨变冲击和影响的普通人。
《寻色中国》首档中国传统色彩人文纪录片，寻找来自天地间的东方美，刻在基因里的中国色。
《味道大师》遍寻山川湖海，通过24组人物故事，呈现“酸甜苦辣咸鲜臭麻”八大口味美食探索！
《赵云》真实全面地记述三国名将赵云的一生！立足于正史记载，寻访赵云的生平经历和遗存，挖掘其鲜为人知的故事传说。
《水底谜案》一封1978年的信件，两具沉没海底的尸体。搁置近40年的谜案重启调查，揭开惊人的案件真相！
《食行荒野》与硬核冒险家马里奥·卡尔普一起环游世界，经由狩猎与烹饪食物，展示不同的文化和美食。
《野火“烤”不尽》解锁隐藏在街头巷尾的烧烤小店，送上“烧烤掌门人”最拿手的招牌美食！
儿童节目：
《水晶岛守卫者》当猫猫变成人去学校上学之后，会引发什么故事？
《超级飞侠18》无限合体！超级飞侠迎接更多挑战！
《汪汪队之小砾与工程家族2》开最棒的挖掘机往前冲！小砾和他的狗狗工程家族来啦！
《我的同学是美人鱼2》人鱼公主的陆地挑战记再来！看人鱼如何在人类学校里上学

【产品功能】
腾讯视频客户端是腾讯视频为电脑设备用户量身打造的网络视频播放客户端，采用轻量级的界面设计，提供高清流畅的播放服务，支持分享视频到QQ和微信，内容涵盖最新最热的电视剧、电影、动漫、综艺、少儿、纪录片、NBA、短剧、体育、游戏、时尚、音乐、直播等特色频道。
1.支持在线观看、离线缓存观看视频。
2.支持通过频道推荐、观看历史、搜索功能快速找到想看的视频。
3.支持倍速播放、快速选集、切换清晰度等在线播放观看功能。
4.支持弹幕互动，在线观看更有趣。
5.开通腾讯视频VIP会员，畅享院线大片。
6.支持微信、QQ、手机号登录腾讯视频。
7.打造我的影院，个性化推荐专区。

【自动订阅服务说明】
1.订阅服务：
 a）腾讯视频VIP连续包月(1个月)、腾讯视频VIP连续包季(3个月)、腾讯视频VIP连续包年(12个月)
 b）超级影视VIP连续包月(1个月)、超级影视VIP连续包季(3个月)、超级影视VIP连续包年(12个月)
 c）腾讯体育VIP连续包月(1个月)、腾讯体育超级VIP连续包月(1个月)
 2.订阅价格：
 a）腾讯视频VIP：连续包月产品为25元/月，连续包季产品为68元/季，连续包年产品为238元/年
 b）超级影视VIP：连续包月产品为35元/月、连续包季产品为98元/季、连续包年产品为348元/年
 c）腾讯体育VIP系列会员：腾讯体育VIP连续包月产品为25元/月、腾讯体育超级VIP连续包月产品为60元/月
 3.付款：用户确认购买并付款后计入iTunes账户
 4.自动续费：苹果iTunes账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后订阅周期顺延一个订阅周期
 5.关闭服务：您可以在苹果手机“设置” --> 进入“iTunes Store 与 App Store”-->点击 “Apple ID”，选择"查看Apple ID"，进入"账户设置"页面，点击“订阅”，管理自动订阅服务，如需取消，每个计费周期结束前24小时关闭即可，到期前24小时内则不再扣费
 6.服务协议： 
 a）腾讯视频VIP：https://film.qq.com/weixin/term.html
 b）超级影视VIP：https://film.qq.com/weixin/term.html?bizId=svip
 c）腾讯体育VIP系列会员：https://film.qq.com/weixin/term.html?bizId=sport
 7 .隐私协议：https://privacy.qq.com/document/preview/3fab9c7fc1424ebda42c3ce488322c8a

【意见反馈】
如遇问题或者有好的建议，欢迎加入QQ体验群反馈，将会有萌哒哒的视频妹为大家解答，并有持续好礼相送！官方QQ群：527288510。

 5.关闭服务：您可以在苹果手机“设置” --> 进入“iTunes Store 与 App Store”-->点击 “Apple ID”，选择"查看Apple ID"，进入"账户设置"页面，点击“订阅”，管理自动订阅服务，如需取消，每个计费周期结束前24小时关闭即可，到期前24小时内则不再扣费
 6.服务协议： 
 a）腾讯视频VIP：https://film.qq.com/weixin/term.html
 b）超级影视VIP：https://film.qq.com/weixin/term.html?bizId=svip
 c）腾讯体育VIP系列会员：https://film.qq.com/weixin/term.html?bizId=sport
 7 .隐私协议：https://privacy.qq.com/document/preview/3fab9c7fc1424ebda42c3ce488322c8a

如遇问题或者有好的建议，欢迎加入QQ体验群反馈，将会有萌哒哒的视频妹为大家解答，并有持续好礼相送！官方QQ群：527288510。

1 为苹果M1，M2芯片优化。

cn.description:
Audio Normalizer 是一款简单易用的音量调节软件，智能统一音量大小，一键批量调整所有音乐或音频文件为大小一致的音量，避免了忽高忽低的声音效果给听众带来不好的体验。常见的音频格式都支持，如MP3, M4A, WAV, AAC, FLAC, WMA, AIFF, AMR, AC3, MP2, OGG, M4R, AU. 

功能：
 1 调整单一的音频文件的音量。
 2 统一多首音乐文件的音量。
3直接无损调节MP3、M4A、WAV文件的音量。
4支持众多流行音频格式：MP3, M4A, WAV, AAC, FLAC, WMA, AIFF, AMR, AC3, MP2, OGG, M4R, AU等音频格式。
5 简单易用,一键批量处理。
6 可自定义音量大小。

Audio Normalizer 反馈：
 任何建议将不胜感激，支持邮箱：market@effectmatrix.com

cn.releaseNotes: + Fixed an issue with formatting queries.
cn.description:
SQLPro Studio is the premium database management tool for Postgres, MySQL, Microsoft Management Studio and Oracle databases.

Some of the great features include:
+ Intellisense/SQL autocompletion.
+ Syntax highlighting with customizable themes (including dark).
+ Tabbed based interface for an optimal user experience.
+ Context aware database tree navigation, including quick access to tables, views, columns, indexes and much more!
+ SQL Beautifier/formatter.
+ Database wide searching.
+ NTLMv2 supported (but not required).
+ Netbios support.
+ Master password support for additional security.
+ Supports Handoff from iOS to macOS.

SQLPro Studio supports the following database servers:
+ MySQL & MariaDB
+ PostgreSQL
+ Microsoft SQL Server (2005 and above)
+ SnowflakeDB
+ SQLite
+ Oracle (8i and above)

Privacy Policy:
https://hankinsoft.com/privacypolicy.html

Terms of Use:
https://hankinsoft.com/termsofuse.html

Price:
SQLPro offers Premium subscriptions (or a single Lifetime purchase) in order to interact with database result sets. Premium subscriptions are available as either a Monthly, or a Yearly duration. Subscriptions auto-renew within 24 hours of the expiration date unless auto-renewal is turned off in the iTunes account settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.

cn.sellerName: Wuhan Net Power Technology Co., Ltd
cn.description:
想制作属于自己独特炫酷的苹果手机铃声吗？或者有时会想把多首歌曲拼接起来当串烧，合并成自己想要的音乐？还是想知道不同歌曲混音后效果？
音乐剪辑（幂果）是一款操作方便的音乐mp3剪切合并混音工具。简单出色，功能实用！不管你是专业音乐人还是音乐小白，都能轻松玩转。

功能特点：
1、专业的铃声剪辑：可自由剪辑，已为您设定铃声最大时长为40s（符合手机铃声特点）！
2、简单的音乐拼接：歌曲剪辑拼接为一体，串烧喜欢的歌曲吧！
3、独特的混音合成：随意剪辑两首曲子，混合一起播放，可以感受不一样的音乐效果！

订阅说明：
- 订阅VIP后，您可以无限制使用所有的功能
- 订阅提供4个时间段的VIP服务，包括：每周VIP服务，每月VIP服务，每年VIP服务，永久VIP服务
- 订阅每周15元，每月30元，每年88元和永久98元
- 购买过程是从iTunes账户中扣除购买金额
- 账户将在当前周期前 24 小时内按所选套餐的费用收取费用
- 有效订阅期间不允许取消当前订阅。但您可以取消下一次订阅。
- 您可以访问(长按) https://www.camoryapps.com/netpower/privacy_policy/musicmixer_cn.html 来阅读我们的隐私政策
- 您可以访问(长按) https://www.camoryapps.com/netpower/service/musicmixer_cn.html 来阅读服务条款
*价格相当于“苹果App Store矩阵”所确定的相当于以美元为单位的认购价。

限时促销。原价28元。只为手快的您准备。

AudioTunes是一款强大的音频转换器，它可以便捷地转化常用格式的音频至iTunes。帮助您在Mac上播放这些音频或者将音频下载到iOS设备中。

主要特征：
* 操作简单
  您所需要做的只有3步：添加文件，选择格式，点击转化按钮.而   不需要进行繁琐的参数设置。
* 自动同步转化后的文件到iTunes
* 转化iTunes不支持的音频格式至iTunes
1.支持的输入格式：MP3，wav，flac，ape，wma，amr，ac3，au       等
2.支持的输出格式：iTunes支持的所有音频格式，例如mp3, aac,       m4a, Apple Lossless, aiff，wav
* 批量转化
    AudioTunes支持在短时间内批量转化多数文件
* 自定义输出文件的存储目录
* 简单方便的用户接口，支持拖放操作
这款应用是一款专为用户隐藏鼠标光标的工具，特别适合全屏演示、视频播放或游戏，让用户能够专注于内容而不受光标的干扰，包括一键隐藏/显示光标、快捷键支持和自定义设置。

us.releaseNotes:
Thank you for using djay! We update the app regularly to provide the best mixing experience for you. Here is what’s new in this release.

• Added setting to unlink controller gain from on-screen gain knob
• Added snap on hold for saved loops
• Improved tempo change during sync behavior: if sync is active, tempo changes on any deck will now synchronize with other decks, regardless of whether the deck itself is currently audible
• Improved Automix and Crossfader FX auto transitions to always use 4 beat sync interval
• Improved Active Deck Protection setting to also apply to Automix mode 
• Fixed edge case where echo was active on song after transition with Automix
• Fixed edge case where triggering a quantized hot cue right at the end of loop was not instantly exiting loop
• Fixed edge case where looper wasn't syncing properly with deck
• Fixed pitch fader estimation using Phase for REL only signal
• Fixed reading of rating metadata from file
• Fixed overview waveform incorrectly zooming in on loop in 4 deck mode
• Fixed filter slider not accessible in EQ tool in 4 deck landscape mode (iPad)
• Fixed missing full-screen video button in landscape + added full screen option to portrait view (iPhone)
• DDJ-REV5, DDJ-GRV6: improved jog wheel sensitivity
• DDJ-FLX10: fixed beat FX not working on decks 3/4
• DJM-S11: fixed unhandled options in Settings Utility
• RANE TWELVE: fixed deck select LEDs turning on when loading song
• Various fixes and improvements

If you enjoy the app please support us by rating it on the App Store. We look forward to your feedback!
us.description:
*** Apple Design Award Winner 2024 ***

Welcome to djay! The #1 DJ app and winner of multiple Apple Design Awards now integrates with Apple Music - mix over 100 million songs instantly!

djay transforms your iOS device into a full-featured DJ system. Seamlessly integrated with your music library, djay allows you to mix your favorite songs and playlists. You can perform live, remix tracks, or enable Automix mode to let djay create a seamless mix for you automatically. Whether you are a professional DJ or a beginner who just loves to play with music, djay offers you the most intuitive yet powerful DJ experience on an iOS device. 

APPLE MUSIC INTEGRATION

• Access to over 100 million songs
• Match: recommendations based on the currently playing song 
• Your library: all your music seamlessly integrated
• Listen Now and Charts integration 
• Discover new music and add songs to your Apple Music library right from within djay
• Powerful search capabilities for the vast catalog of Apple Music

ADVANCED MEDIA LIBRARY

• Apple Music: 100+ million tracks, your personal library in the cloud (Apple Music subscription)
• TIDAL: Millions of tracks, high quality sound (TIDAL DJ Extension)
• SoundCloud: Millions of underground and premium tracks (SoundCloud Go+)
• Beatport: Millions of electronic music tracks (Beatport Advanced Subscriptions)
• Beatsource: Millions of open-format music tracks (Beatsource Subscription)
• Files: access files in the cloud (e.g. Dropbox), on your iOS device, or on external hard drives seamlessly
• My Collection: Powerful playlists management 

AUTOMIX

• Automatic, beat-matched mixes 
• Queue and Playlist automation

NEURAL MIX™

• Isolate vocals, drums, and instrumentals in real-time (not supported with Apple Music)

MUSIC PRODUCTION TOOLS

• Sequencer: create beats on top of your music live
• Looper: remix your music with up to 48 loops per track
• Beat-matched sequencing of drums and samples
• Extensive content library with hundreds of loops and samples.

HARDWARE INTEGRATION

• Plug-and-play integration with over 100 MIDI controllers by Pioneer DJ, Reloop, Hercules, Numark, Denon DJ, and more
• Digital Vinyl System (DVS) Integration
• Advanced MIDI Learn to map any class-compliant MIDI controller
• Support for Bluetooth audio and MIDI
• Support for multi-channel USB audio interfaces and video output

POWERFUL AUDIO ENGINE

• Ableton Link integration
• Fluid Beatgrid
• High-res waveforms

BUILT FOR iOS

• Accessible via VoiceOver
• Airplay, Live Photos, Apple Watch, and iCloud integration
• Haptic Feedback, Drag & Drop, Keyboard Shortcuts
• Multi-Tasking: Slide Over and Split View support

Top features of the optional Pro subscription include: 

• Unlimited access to an extensive library of samples, loops, FX, and visuals 
• Neural Mix™
• Sampler & Looper 
• Automix 
• Crossfader FX 
• Video Mixing 
• Music Visualizers
• Single Deck mode
• 4-Deck mode 
• Advanced media library editing
• Pre-cueing with headphones 
• Hardware integration (MIDI controllers, DVS, multi-channel audio interfaces)
• 7-day free trial: free access to all djay Pro content and features for one week, cancel anytime

The optional PRO subscription allows you to subscribe once and use djay Pro across all your Mac and iOS devices, including access to all PRO features, as well as 1000+ loops, samples, and visuals.

A supported streaming subscription and an internet connection are required to access songs from a streaming service in djay. No recording available for streamed songs. Neural Mix cannot be used when streaming from Apple Music. Specific songs may not be available or accessible on your account or in your country. Streaming service availability and pricing may vary depending on country, currency and service.

us.releaseNotes:
Thank you for using djay! We update the app regularly to provide the best mixing experience for you. Here is what’s new in this release.

• Added setting to unlink controller gain from on-screen gain knob
• Added snap on hold for saved loops
• Improved tempo change during sync behavior: if sync is active, tempo changes on any deck will now synchronize with other decks, regardless of whether the deck itself is currently audible
• Improved Automix and Crossfader FX auto transitions to always use 4 beat sync interval
• Improved Active Deck Protection setting to also apply to Automix mode 
• Fixed edge case where echo was active on song after transition with Automix
• Fixed edge case where triggering a quantized hot cue right at the end of loop was not instantly exiting loop
• Fixed edge case where looper wasn't syncing properly with deck
• Fixed pitch fader estimation using Phase for REL only signal
• Fixed reading of rating metadata from file
• Fixed overview waveform incorrectly zooming in on loop in 4 deck mode
• Fixed filter slider not accessible in EQ tool in 4 deck landscape mode (iPad)
• Fixed missing full-screen video button in landscape + added full screen option to portrait view (iPhone)
• DDJ-REV5, DDJ-GRV6: improved jog wheel sensitivity
• DDJ-FLX10: fixed beat FX not working on decks 3/4
• DJM-S11: fixed unhandled options in Settings Utility
• RANE TWELVE: fixed deck select LEDs turning on when loading song
• Various fixes and improvements

If you enjoy the app please support us by rating it on the App Store. We look forward to your feedback!

us.releaseNotes:
- Smaller bugfixes
- Added One Time Purchase again for limited time 


Thanks a lot for using Vythm! If you have any questions or ideas for new features, feel free to reach out to me using info@mkgames.org. 
- best Marvin
us.description:
--- Experience Your Music with Vythm ---
Unlock the potential of music visualization with Vythm! Vythm is a versatile music visualization app that allows you to create visual artworks in harmony with your selected music. It includes a variety of unique visualization modes, including Equalizer, Mandala, Shapes, Fluids, Psychedelic, Dreaming, and more. Choose a background and apply image effects to personalize your visualization completely.

--- Your Vision, Your Visualization ---
Vythm provides you with numerous options to realize your creative vision:
- Over 100 carefully selected backgrounds.
- MIDI input for precise visual control.
- NDI streaming support for sharing your creations.
- Real-time image effects like color correction, bloom, chromatic aberration, and more.
- Size, rotation, and orientation adjustments.
And much more!

The Equalizer, Rhythm, and Peer modes are available for free, while other modes can be unlocked through a subscription.

--- Input Formats ---
Select your music from a variety of sources:
- Import any mp3 or m4a files.
- Access your iTunes library (Please note that Apple Music is not currently supported).
- Utilize your device's microphone, with sensitivity adjustments for various use cases.
- Enjoy three preselected songs for quick inspiration.

--- Record Your Masterpiece ---
Vythm offers a recording feature that enables you to share or save your creations. Revisit your immersive visual world at your convenience or dazzle your audience with your artistic masterpiece.

--- Share Your Thoughts ---
Our top priority is to provide you with the best possible experience. If you encounter issues or have ideas for new features, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@mkgames.org.

If you enjoy the app, we would greatly appreciate your feedback and a review! Thank you for choosing Vythm!

Download and experience Vythm (Music Visualization 2024 / Audio Visualizer) today!

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

us.trackCensoredName: 奇游加速器 - 全球游戏畅玩
us.trackName: 奇游加速器 - 全球游戏畅玩
us.description:
【 热门游戏，“游”先支持】
支持PUBGM、王者荣耀国际服 、使命召唤战区、绝地求生：刺激战场 、吃鸡外服、鹅鸭杀手游，暗区突围国际服、飞机大厨、咒术回战、炉石传说国际服、ROBLOX国际版、原神国际服、英雄联盟手游（lol：wild rift）、云顶之弈手游、方舟：终极移动版等游戏加速！

【海量手游库 新游上线快 】
支持PUBGM、王者国际服、使命召唤战区、星际战甲国际服、炉石传说国际服、暗区突围国际服、飞机大厨、对峙2、云顶之奕PBE、鹅鸭杀、赛马娘、pubg2、暗黑破坏神不朽、apex手游、二之国、全境封锁手游、战地手游、瓦罗兰特手游、绝地求生刺激战场全球服、使命召唤手游全球服、八方旅人、符文大地传说、Among US、游戏王、方舟生存进化、黎明杀机、公主连接、冒险岛M、地球末日生存、Teon中文版、剑灵：革命、战争机器人、地牢猎手5、FIFA、碧蓝幻想全球服、iron force、世界计划、多彩舞台、第七史诗（epic 7）、和平精英全球服、堡垒之夜、fgo、影之诗、失落龙约黑色沙漠、文明重启全球服、荒野乱斗、狂野飙车9等游戏加速！游戏库包罗千款好玩游戏，热游新游排行一目了然。平均每天3款游戏的速度上新。App内可以随时提交想玩的游戏，你想玩的我们都支持！

【 奇游电竞级加速 】
奇游全自研“Qiy”电竞级加速引擎震撼上线，加速稳定性更胜一筹，不惧移动网络的波动。基于奇游电竞级游戏网络，带你感受稳定流畅的游戏体验。低延迟、不掉线，WIFI/5G随心切换。

【新游推荐 硬核攻略 】
新增游戏清单、新游预上线时间表等功能，更多实用、funny的游戏主题等你探索。游戏介绍、新游推荐、硬核攻略，丰富的游戏深度内容带你打开新世界的大门！

【客服小队 随时待命 】
奇游客服小队7x12h陪伴你的左右。使用过程中有任何疑问和反馈，我们随时待命。

【自动续费套餐说明】
1、订阅周期及套餐名称：1个月（连续包月），3个月(连续包季)
2、订阅价格：以IAP申请信息为准，例如连续包月价格为首月15元，次月15元/月自动续费 
3、付款：用户确认购买并付款后计入iTunes账户。
4、取消续订：如需取消续订，请在当前订阅周期到期前24小时以前，手动在iTunes/Apple ID设置管理中关闭自动续费功能，到期前24小时内取消，将会收取订阅费用。
5、续订：苹果iTunes账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后订阅周期顺延一个订阅周期。
6、隐私政策：https://www.qiyou.cn/specials/qymobile-protocol.html
7、服务协议：https://mfront.qiyou.cn/protocol.html
8、自动续费会员服务协议：https://mfront.qiyou.cn/renewal-protocol.html

*本加速器的加速功能仅针对游戏使用，无法访问海外网站。

DeviceMirror Lite can use Wi-Fi connection to mirror the screen and sound of your iOS device to the computer. With it, you can watch online HD movies on the big screen, share game videos on the big screen, listen to music on the phone on the computer, and record online courses. , Demo demo video recording, App usage tutorial video recording, etc.
The main function:
1 Support Wi-Fi connection for mirroring (Support AirPlay protocol,no need to install App on iOS device).
2 Support multiple devices to mirror at the same time.
3 Support video recording.
4 Support real-time screenshots.
5 Support horizontal screen projection to watch online movies.
6 Support more than 200 online websites such as YouTube to air-play video to the computer for playback.
7 Support to use Mac computer as the keyboard of iOS device for input
8 Support to cut MP4 or MOV format video.
9 Support to extract and convert the audio in the video to MP3 or M4R format audio.
10 Supports cutting audio in mp3, m4a, and m4r formats.
11 Supports audio recording with computer microphone, computer speakers and computer microphone+speaker combination.

Pay attention:
Since OSX 12 Monterey may turn on the system's AirPlay service by default, if the system AirPlay service is turned on, the Wi-Fi connection of DeviceMirror will not work properly.You need to disable the AirPlay receiver in System Preferences->Sharing->AirPlay Receiver

System version support: OSX 10.13 and above

1 Support system sound recording without installing audio driver in macOS 13 and above
us.description:
DeviceMirror can use a USB or wifi connection to mirror the screen and sound of your iOS device to the computer. With it, you can watch online HD movies on the big screen, share game videos on the big screen, listen to music on the phone on the computer, and record online courses. Demo demo video recording, App usage tutorial video recording.
The main function:
1 Support USB connection and wifi connection for mirroring (Support AirPlay protocol,no need to install App on iOS device).
2 Support multiple devices to mirror at the same time.
3 USB connection supports 720P, 1080P, 4K, HD display and recording (1080P and 4K are supported by OSX 10.15 and above) and supports pause recording and resume recording.
4 Wi-Fi connection supports display and recording in four resolutions: HD-Retina, HD, HD-Medium, and 1080P.
5 The recording format supports MP4, MOV, GIF.
6 Support real-time screenshots in PNG and JPEG formats.
7 Support horizontal screen projection to watch online movies.
8 Support to play online movies in the air.
9 Support more than 200 online websites such as YouTube to air-play video to the computer for playback
10 Support to use Mac computer as the keyboard of iOS device for input
11 Support Mac computer and iOS device to share clipboard
12 Support to cut the video in MP4 or MOV format
13 Support to convert the audio in the video to MP3 or M4R format audio
14 Supports cutting audio in mp3, m4a, and m4r formats.
15 Supports audio recording with computer microphone, computer speakers and computer microphone+speaker combination.


Pay attention:
Since OSX 12 Monterey may turn on the system's AirPlay service by default, if the system AirPlay service is turned on, the Wi-Fi connection of DeviceMirror will not work properly.You need to disable the AirPlay receiver in System Preferences->Sharing->AirPlay Receiver

System version support: OSX 10.13 and above

This software allows right-click, copy, cut, and paste functionality on all websites. It has a simple interface and is easy to use. You can copy any content, whether it’s text, images, or other media.
A professional 3D viewer for STEP/STP, IGES/IGS, and other 3D file formats. Supports printing and converting 3D files with ease.

On sale. Original $4.99.
*** Don't forget to download "Total Video Converter Pro" which converts any video and burns DVD. 50% OFF! ***

AudioTunes is a powerful audio converter that converts common audios (MP3，wav，flac，ape，wma，amr，ac3，au etc) to iTunes simply by 3 clicks. You can play those audios on your Mac or download them to the iOS devices.

Key features:
* Easy to Use (No Complicated Setting)
   Only 3 steps: Add files - Select the format - Click “Convert” button 

* Synchronize converted audios to iTunes automatically

* Convert audios formats that iTunes does not support into iTunes
1. Input formats: MP3，wav，flac，ape，wma，amr，ac3，au ,etc.   
2.Output formats: Almost all formats that iTunes supported, such as        mp3, aac, m4a, Apple Lossless, aiff

* Batch conversion
AudioTunes supports batch convert numerous files in a short time.

* Save converted audios to custom directory

* Drag & Drop is supported.

This app is a tool designed for users to hide the mouse cursor, which is particularly suitable for full-screen presentations, video playback or games, allowing users to focus on the content without being disturbed by the cursor, including one-click hiding/showing the cursor, shortcut key support, and custom settings.

us.description:
Wink 
l Make any low-quality video & photo into HD/Ultra HD/4K with before/after comparisons.
l Making video editing easier than ever!
l Various creative video transition effects enhance final results!
l Fine-tune your selfies with video retouch tools to highlight your day!

Video ＆ Photo Enhance
- Video Enhancer: Enhance portraits and selfies to stunning output.
- 4K Upscaler: AI-powered 4K upscaling for enhanced video quality.
- Stabilize: Smooth out shaky footage for professional-looking videos. 
- Noise reduction: Reduce video noise and grain for professional-looking results.
-  AI Color: Give your video a vibrant, fresh look with our easy-to-use color enhancement tool

Video Retouch
- Manual Face Slimming: Adjust your facial features as you wish
- Body Shape: Achieve a supermodel physique!
- Stylish Makeup: Providing a range of natural makeup
- Face Editor: Remove acne, Face Plump, Skin tone ... and more!
- Whiten Teeth: Say goodbye to brown teeth and show off your smile!

Video Editing
- Professional Editing: Color, Crop, Speed, Split, Mirror, Soundtrack and more!
- Templates: Easily apply to create high-quality vlogs
- Quality Restoration: Clear AI-enhanced video restoration!
- Effects: Adds texts, stickers, and transitions to enhance your videos
- Automatic Subtitle: Utilizes intelligent voice recognition for easy text inputting


AI Captions
- Accurate AI subtitles for your videos in seconds 
- Support Bilingual: Create dual-language subtitles for your videos
- Support 8 languages

Wink VIP
- Access exclusive VIP features

Wink offers a wide range of exclusive VIP features to enhance retouching experience. We are committed to providing you with an improved service. We look forward to your continuing support.
- Subscriptions

Wink VIP-Monthly Subscription offers a subscription period of one month.
Wink VIP-Annual subscription entails a 12-month period.
*The subscription price is determined based on the information provided in the in-app purchase (iAP) application.

- Instructions for Payment and Cancellation

"Payment" will be credited to your iTunes account once you have confirmed and paid for your subscription.

"Renewal" subscriptions for "Monthly/Annual" plans are automatically renewed and will incur charges to your iTunes account following your purchase confirmation. The subscription will be automatically renewed. To cancel it, please disable the automatic renewal at least 24 hours before the subscription period ends. Within 24 hours before the subscription cycle expires, Apple will automatically debit your iTunes account, extending your subscription for a new cycle.

"To cancel your subscription, kindly navigate to the "Settings" section on your iPhone, click on "Apple ID," proceed to the "Subscription" screen, and choose "Wink" to terminate your subscription.

- Agreement

Privacy Policy：https://pro.meitu.com/wink-cut/agreements/common/policy-global.html?lang=en

us.releaseNotes:
Thank you for using djay! We update the app regularly to provide the best mixing experience for you. Here is what’s new in this release.

• Added setting to unlink controller gain from on-screen gain knob
• Added snap on hold for saved loops
• Improved tempo change during sync behavior: if sync is active, tempo changes on any deck will now synchronize with other decks, regardless of whether the deck itself is currently audible
• Improved Automix and Crossfader FX auto transitions to always use 4 beat sync interval
• Improved Active Deck Protection setting to also apply to Automix mode 
• Fixed edge case where echo was active on song after transition with Automix
• Fixed edge case where triggering a quantized hot cue right at the end of loop was not instantly exiting loop
• Fixed edge case where looper wasn't syncing properly with deck
• Fixed pitch fader estimation using Phase for REL only signal
• Fixed reading of rating metadata from file
• Fixed overview waveform incorrectly zooming in on loop in 4 deck mode
• Fixed filter slider not accessible in EQ tool in 4 deck landscape mode (iPad)
• Fixed missing full-screen video button in landscape + added full screen option to portrait view (iPhone)
• DDJ-REV5, DDJ-GRV6: improved jog wheel sensitivity
• DDJ-FLX10: fixed beat FX not working on decks 3/4
• DJM-S11: fixed unhandled options in Settings Utility
• RANE TWELVE: fixed deck select LEDs turning on when loading song
• Various fixes and improvements

If you enjoy the app please support us by rating it on the App Store. We look forward to your feedback!
us.description:
*** Apple Design Award Winner 2024 ***

Welcome to djay! The #1 DJ app and winner of multiple Apple Design Awards now integrates with Apple Music - mix over 100 million songs instantly!

djay transforms your iOS device into a full-featured DJ system. Seamlessly integrated with your music library, djay allows you to mix your favorite songs and playlists. You can perform live, remix tracks, or enable Automix mode to let djay create a seamless mix for you automatically. Whether you are a professional DJ or a beginner who just loves to play with music, djay offers you the most intuitive yet powerful DJ experience on an iOS device. 

APPLE MUSIC INTEGRATION

• Access to over 100 million songs
• Match: recommendations based on the currently playing song 
• Your library: all your music seamlessly integrated
• Listen Now and Charts integration 
• Discover new music and add songs to your Apple Music library right from within djay
• Powerful search capabilities for the vast catalog of Apple Music

ADVANCED MEDIA LIBRARY

• Apple Music: 100+ million tracks, your personal library in the cloud (Apple Music subscription)
• TIDAL: Millions of tracks, high quality sound (TIDAL DJ Extension)
• SoundCloud: Millions of underground and premium tracks (SoundCloud Go+)
• Beatport: Millions of electronic music tracks (Beatport Advanced Subscriptions)
• Beatsource: Millions of open-format music tracks (Beatsource Subscription)
• Files: access files in the cloud (e.g. Dropbox), on your iOS device, or on external hard drives seamlessly
• My Collection: Powerful playlists management 

AUTOMIX

• Automatic, beat-matched mixes 
• Queue and Playlist automation

NEURAL MIX™

• Isolate vocals, drums, and instrumentals in real-time (not supported with Apple Music)

MUSIC PRODUCTION TOOLS

• Sequencer: create beats on top of your music live
• Looper: remix your music with up to 48 loops per track
• Beat-matched sequencing of drums and samples
• Extensive content library with hundreds of loops and samples.

HARDWARE INTEGRATION

• Plug-and-play integration with over 100 MIDI controllers by Pioneer DJ, Reloop, Hercules, Numark, Denon DJ, and more
• Digital Vinyl System (DVS) Integration
• Advanced MIDI Learn to map any class-compliant MIDI controller
• Support for Bluetooth audio and MIDI
• Support for multi-channel USB audio interfaces and video output

POWERFUL AUDIO ENGINE

• Ableton Link integration
• Fluid Beatgrid
• High-res waveforms

BUILT FOR iOS

• Accessible via VoiceOver
• Airplay, Live Photos, Apple Watch, and iCloud integration
• Haptic Feedback, Drag & Drop, Keyboard Shortcuts
• Multi-Tasking: Slide Over and Split View support

Top features of the optional Pro subscription include: 

• Unlimited access to an extensive library of samples, loops, FX, and visuals 
• Neural Mix™
• Sampler & Looper 
• Automix 
• Crossfader FX 
• Video Mixing 
• Music Visualizers
• Single Deck mode
• 4-Deck mode 
• Advanced media library editing
• Pre-cueing with headphones 
• Hardware integration (MIDI controllers, DVS, multi-channel audio interfaces)
• 7-day free trial: free access to all djay Pro content and features for one week, cancel anytime

The optional PRO subscription allows you to subscribe once and use djay Pro across all your Mac and iOS devices, including access to all PRO features, as well as 1000+ loops, samples, and visuals.

A supported streaming subscription and an internet connection are required to access songs from a streaming service in djay. No recording available for streamed songs. Neural Mix cannot be used when streaming from Apple Music. Specific songs may not be available or accessible on your account or in your country. Streaming service availability and pricing may vary depending on country, currency and service.
